item.title: About
item.description: I am a computer scientist and software developer working in and around London. The intended audience for this blog is for the most part my future self, with the posts serving as reminders for how to get things done.

item.title: Starting from scratch
item.description: In which I describe the starter projects for the languages and frameworks I work with. These currently comprise Ruby (non Rails), Ruby on Rails, Python and Hugo

item.title: Hugo blog with Org and GitHub Actions
item.description: In which I setup a working environment for writing a Hugo blog in Org with automatic deployment using GitHub Actions.

item.title: Creating custom Hugo theme with Tailwind CSS
item.description: In which I create a new Hugo theme using Tailwind CSS and Hugo Pipes, and upgrade my GitHub Actions workflow to use NPM.
